channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Teaching office reception on Friday, 19 December 2025
item.description: On Friday, 19 December, the student services for Law and Sciences of Legal Services degree programmes will be available remotely only, via MS Teams (please click on the following link) or by phone at 02-50312473, from 9:30 to 12:00.%0A

item.title: Call for CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i cittadinanza B1 exams on 18 February 2026
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i cittadinanza B1 exams scheduled on 18 February 2026.%0A %0A%0AüìÑ Bando CELI i_18 febbraio in inglese_signed.pdf

item.title: Se.Fa offices closure and student reception during Christmas holidays
item.description: Se.Fa office will be closed on January 5, 2026. Student reception for Law and Sciences of Legal Services degree programmes will be available remotely only from 29 to 31 December 2025, either via MS Teams by appointment (please write to sefa.giurisprudenza@unimi.it) or by phone at 02-50312473. Click on the notice title for more info.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Humanities Se.Fa office closure during Christmas holidays
item.description: The Faculty of Humanities Se.Fa Office will be closed on Wednesday, 31 December 2025 and on Monday, 5 January 2026.%0A

item.title: Political, Economic and Social Sciences Se.Fa office closure during Christmas holidays
item.description: The Faculty of Political, Economic and Social Sciences Se.Fa office will be closed on 31 December 2025.%0A

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 26 + 28 January 2026 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 26 + 28 January 2026.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 26 + 28 January 2026 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 26 + 28 January 2026.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 26 + 29 January 2026 - 1 SEAT AVAILABLE
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 26 + 29 January 2026.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: MEETINGS ON OPPORTUNITIES FOR INTERNATIONAL MOBILITY
item.description: We inform all interested students at the School of Pharmacy that ONLINE information meetings will be organised regarding international mobility and the Erasmus+ programme 2026-2027%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: MyCampus Survey¬†‚Äì¬†Service quality starts with you
item.description: The MyCampus Survey is now open for answers until 18 January 2026. Just spare a few minutes of your time to help us identify needs and issues regarding the services offered by the University.%0A%0Aüîó Learn more

item.title: Call for general practitioners a. y. 2024/25
item.description: The Faculty Management Committee has decided to award 1 unpaid teaching contract to General Practitioners for the single-cycle Master's degree programme in Medicine and Surgery in English (International Medical School).%0AHow to apply: Elixform%0ADeadline: 5 December 2024%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Extension of Document Submission Deadline
item.description: Please be informed that the deadline for submitting the required documentation for enrolment has been extended to December 31, 2025.%0A
